sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import bootstrap from "bootstrap"; import { Container } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Row } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import '../App.css'; import { Button } from "react-bootstrap"; export class UserDetails extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { user: this.props.user, repos: this.props.user.repos } } makeRepoDetails() { console.log(this.props.user.login) console.log(this.state.repos) let repos = this.state.repos.map(repo => {

{repo.name}
{repo.description}
{repo.created_at}
{repo.updated_at}
Last commits:
{repo.commits.map(commit => {

Commit message: {commit.commit.message}

})}

}) return ( repos ) } render () { //const repos = this.makeRepoDetails() const user = this.state.user const repos = this.state.repos return (

GitHub details for {user.login}

Username: {}

Name: {user.name}

Email: {user.email}

Bio: {user.bio}

Location: {user.location}

Recent repos:

{repos[0].name}

{/*

Name: Fake repo
Description:
Creation date:
Last commit:

*/}

Commit info

Commit info

Commit info

Name:
Description:
Creation date:
Last commit:

Name:
Description:
Creation date:
Last commit:

) } }
